objects.text:
• 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II Sensor
• Advanced 77-Point AF System
• Built-in Electronic Viewfinder
• Film Simulation Modes

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled compact mirrorless camera design
• High-performance 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II APS-C sensor
• Advanced autofocus system with 77 selectable AF points
• Built-in electronic viewfinder (EVF) with 2.36M-dot resolution
• Tiltable 3.0-inch LCD screen for versatile shooting angles
• Real-time shooting controls with dedicated dials for shutter speed, exposure, and more
• Compatible with Fujifilm's renowned X-mount lens system
• Full HD 1080p video recording capabilities
• Built-in Wi-Fi for easy photo sharing and remote control
• Compact and lightweight body perfect for travel photography
• Film simulation modes to recreate classic Fujifilm styles
• Fast continuous shooting up to 8.0 fps
• Weather-sealed metal body construction

banner_details:
This banner showcases a premium digital camera product set against a sleek, dark grid background divided into four quadrants with various dark grey tones. The top-left quadrant hosts a bold and vibrant heading (`heading`) in white, paired with a red tagline (`tagline`) to highlight the product type. A high-resolution camera product image (`product_image`) is placed prominently on the right, drawing attention to its features. The bottom left section presents a bullet point list of key specifications (`description`) in white, a large price tag (`price`), and a vivid red call-to-action button (`cta_button`, `cta`) encouraging immediate purchase.

**Color Palette:**
- Charcoal Black: #212121
- Deep Grey: #2C2C2C / #1A1A1A
- Bright White: #FFFFFF
- Crimson Red: #CC0000
product_color: The product image presents the Fujifilm X-T10 camera, featuring a sleek, professional aesthetic that integrates a monochromatic color palette dominated by matte and glossy blacks. This dominant black tone (#1A1A1A) offers a bold, modern foundation. Subtle metallic highlights in silver (#C0C0C0) and chrome accent the dials and lens rings, creating contrast and depth. White text highlights (#FFFFFF) provide clarity and branding focus, while tiny hints of orange (#FF8C00) and red (#FF0000) around the lens add visual intrigue without overpowering the image. These colors are subtly blended to emphasize high-tech precision and elegance, making the overall design ideal for a premium photography-focused advertisement.
